TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontStretch extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: Describes the degree to which a font has been stretched compared to the normal aspect ratio of that font.

span.span: Describes the degree to which a font has been stretched compared to the normal aspect ratio of that font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ampliação de uma fonte descreve o grau ao qual um formulário de fonte é estendido da sua taxa de proporção normal, que é a largura altura especificada para os glifos na fonte original.A font stretch describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font. O valores correspondem do `usWidthClass` definição no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] especificação.The values correspond to the `usWidthClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification. O `usWidthClass` representa um valor inteiro entre 1 e 9 — valores mais baixos indicam mais estreitas larguras; valores mais altos indicam larguras mais ampla.The `usWidthClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 9—lower values indicate narrower widths; higher values indicate wider widths. |Ampliação de fonteFont stretch|usWidthClassusWidthClass|% normal% of normal| |------------------|------------------|-----------------| ||11|50.0%50.0%| ||22|62.5%62.5%| ||33|75.0%75.0%| ||44|87.5%87.5%| ||55|100.0%100.0%| ||66|112.5%112.5%| ||77|125.0%125.0%| ||88|150.0%150.0%| ||99|200.0%200.0%| Para obter mais informações sobre o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` valor, consulte o ["Tabelas de arquivo fonte"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) seção o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] especificação.For more information on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` value, see the ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) section of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification. ## Uso do Atributo XAMLXAML Attribute Usage ```

param.span: The first object to compare.

span.span: The first object to compare.

param.span: The second object to compare.

Compares two instances of objects.

returns.span: An value that represents the relationship between the two instances of .

span.span: An value that represents the relationship between the two instances of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando o valor retornado é menor que zero, `left` é menor que `right`.When the return value is less than zero, `left` is less than `right`. Quando esse valor é zero, ele indica que ambos os operandos são iguais.When this value is zero, it indicates that both operands are equal. Quando o valor é maior que zero, isso indica que `left` é maior do que `right`.When the value is greater than zero, it indicates that `left` is greater than `right`.
